title: Multi-screen background scenics video
snippet:
This project includes finding clips online (youtube, vimeo, etc), downloading them, and editing them together in an interesting way into a super-wide multi-screen video (5:1).  Because this video is for a closed one-time event, we are not concerned with copyright.

See screenshots for examples. I have some clips collected already to get the project started. Very specific project details offered once project begins. This project is a very tight turnaround. Generous bonus will be offered for excellent work and completing tasks on-schedule or ahead of schedule.

Potential for collaboration on many future projects if we like the work!
